memberdef.name: TMC2160_FIELD_WRITE
memberdef.initializer: (tmc2160_writeInt(tdef, address, FIELD_SET(tmc2160_readInt(tdef, address), mask, shift, value)))

memberdef.argsstring: (TMC2160TypeDef *tmc2160, uint8_t address, uint8_t x1, uint8_t x2, uint8_t x3, uint8_t x4)
memberdef.name: tmc2160_writeDatagram
